activities: InVentiv receives key-coded clinical research subject data from the EU as well as clinical investigational staff data in the form of personal CVs and questionnaires.InVentiv also receives personal information about organization’s employees, past or present, collected in the context of the employment relationship
corpofftitle1: Vice President, inVentiv Health Clinical, Inc.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, On-line, manually processed data from clients, customer, employees, clinical trial data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
